iti13:1.1: This was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
iti13:2.1: “Mendicants, without directly knowing and completely understanding disdain, without dispassion for it and giving it up, you can’t end suffering.
iti13:2.2: By directly knowing and completely understanding the all, having dispassion for it and giving it up, you can end suffering.”
iti13:2.3: That is what the Buddha said.
